data.eml:eml: Hispaniodirphia lemaireiana n. sp., a new saturniid from the Greater Antilles (Lepidoptera: Saturniidae, Hemileucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rougerie, Rodolphe, Herbin, Daniel (2006): Hispaniodirphia lemaireiana n. sp., a new saturniid from the Greater Antilles (Lepidoptera: Saturniidae, Hemileucinae). Zootaxa 1204: 53-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172358
